Articles.Content:
An extremely light glider-like craft, Ventra 1 is the first plane I designed to break the speed of sound. (I only managed it once, so no promises.) It's also maneuverable in a way that I absolutely adore.

Download:

http://www./?6afjahrftij97h7

Looks cool, I've never thought of using a structural piece besides the fuel tanks for the body of a plane.

Only thing that worries me is the A-SAS instead of an aeronautics package, but I like it!
